sql-statements.statement: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT patient.simple_name, TO_CHAR(event.start_time - ?, 'MM/DD/YYYY HH12:MI AM') AS start_time, ea.value_textB AS resource_id, replace(aat.caption, 'Patient', null) AS patient_type, initcap(event.subject) as subject, pa.value_text as home_phone, stat.caption, org.org_id, initcap(event.remarks) as remarks, event.event_id, scheduled_by_id, TO_CHAR(scheduled_stamp - ?, 'MM/DD/YYYY HH12:MI AM') AS scheduled_stamp, patient.person_id AS patient_id, at.caption as appt_type, (SELECT value_text FROM Person_Attribute pa WHERE pa.parent_id = patient.person_id AND pa.item_name = 'Patient/Account Number' ) as account_number, (SELECT value_text FROM Person_Attribute pa WHERE pa.parent_id = patient.person_id AND pa.item_name = 'Patient/Chart Number' ) as chart_number, initcap(patient.complete_sortable_name) as patient_name FROM Person patient, Appt_Attendee_Type aat, Event_Attribute ea, Event, Appt_Status stat, Org, Appt_Type at, Person_Attribute pa WHERE Org.org_id like upper(?) AND Event.facility_id = org.org_internal_id AND Event.start_time BETWEEN TO_DATE(?, 'MM/DD/YYYY HH12:MI AM') AND TO_DATE(?, 'MM/DD/YYYY HH12:MI AM') AND ea.parent_id = event.event_id AND ea.value_type = 333 AND patient.person_id = ea.value_text AND upper(ea.value_textB) LIKE upper(?) AND Event.event_status = stat.id AND stat.id BETWEEN ? and ? AND aat.id = ea.value_int AND Event.owner_id = ? AND at.appt_type_id (+) = Event.appt_type AND pa.parent_id (+) = patient.person_id AND pa.value_type (+) = 10 AND pa.item_name (+) = 'Home' ORDER BY event.start_time, event.event_id ) WHERE rownum <= 250
